nodes.text: Star Wars: The Last Jedi The Ultimate Guide
Star Wars: The Last Jedi The Ultimate Guide is a magazine detailing Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi, released by Titan Magazines on December 11, 2018.
Experience all of the behind-the-scenes facts with this Ultimate Souvenir Guide of the eighth instalment of the biggest movie franchise of all time, Star Wars: The Last Jedi!

Presenting in-depth interviews with the all-star cast, exclusive revelations from the crew on the making of the movie, concept art, behind-the-scenes photography, and more, Star Wars The Ultimate Souvenir Guide is the complete, official, authoritative guide to the film.
